name: *NEW* Vega Necklace
description:
A geometric themed necklace featuring an acrylic and brass pendant. 

Vega is a star in the 'Summer Triangle' pattern of stars visible in the northern hemisphere in Autumn. 

The large grey acrylic hexagon measures 28mm wide, the brass triangle mount measure 25mm wide. 
They hang on a 61cm / 24 inch gold plated chain. Also featured is a grey acrylic hexagon charm on the clasp.

Your necklace will arrive in a hand made pouch.

~ALL OUR ITEMS ARE CONSTRUCTED WITH CARE IN THE CUSTOM MADE STUDIO~

CLICK PIC TO SUPERSIZE!

name: *NEW* Geo Heart Brooch
description:
If you love a little sparkle this is the perfect accessory for you.

Our lovely statement glitter brooch measures 6.5cm wide and 5.5cm tall. 

Quite a piece!

Its heart shaped in a geometric way. 

Each lovely brooch is mounted on a silver lockable brooch pin.

name: *NEW* Shapes Necklace

The polygon measures 10mm, the large triangle measures 12mm and the small triangle measures 9mm.

The chain measures 46cm/18 inches. The shapes are brass.

Your necklace will arrive in a little hand made pouch.

~ALL OUR ITEMS ARE MADE WITH CARE IN THE CUSTOM MADE STUDIO~

The gold glitter triangle measure 2.6cm / 26mm on the longest side. The earring stud is mounted at the top so the earrings drop below the lobe.

The shapes are mounted on sterling silver stud mounts.
